Ask away children <3

title: Returning to the Staff Team AMA

Gr8 Jr Mod from what I've seen so far

Not really, just changed from a private catholic school to a state/public school.

replies.body:
Hey Fiperz! I remember when I interviewed you for Junior Mod, seeing you develop as a moderator is awesome to see! Anyway... questions!

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. How do you start a conversation?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Congratulations on your return and have fun! Have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body: Don't remember you that well, but you were chill and cool to talk to :)
replies.body_tagged: Don't remember you that well, but you were chill and cool to talk to :)

replies.body:
1. Ye
2. I pulled an all nighter once
3. Yes, it hurt :(
4. Making other people happy makes me happy
5. I usually start a conversation by kind of listening in to what the person is saying and if I know about the topic, I'll contribute my knowledge.
6. A bit of pop, alternative, dance etc. Anything but metal and country lmao.
7. You were so funny when I talked to you and so friendly <3
8. Someone said I was smart when I had just changed schools and no one knew me.

Thanks Aura <3

replies.body:
Hello DaFiperz!!
Welcome back to Avicus!!
I don't know you that well, but from what I see, lots of players remember you!
I hope we can get along in the future!!
Questions:

1. What is your favorite color?
2. Are you a YouTuber?
3. Opinions on me? (If you have any)
4. How do you look like?
5. Are you a male or female?
6. Do you have a girlfriend/boyfriend, crush, or are you single?
7. How old are you?
8. What is your nationality?
9. Rate Avicus from 1-10
10. What's your favorite fast food?

See you in game!
And congratulations!!

replies.body:
Thaaanks!
I chose to leave because I needed to catch up on school work and I came back because I've caught up.
Some were memes, and this one was stolen. DingDeLaDoggo is the name of a facebook meme page xD
Caramello Cadbury chocolate <3
I can't even remember how I discovered Avicus TBH, but I decided to apply for staff when I was just getting back into Minecraft and I used to play on this server quite a bit a few years ago. I applied for staff because I wanted to contribute to my favorite server.
For me, you seem to be everywhere on the forums and nowhere in game lol. Still a cool guy tho.

Thanks!

1. Gold
2. Nah
3. Haven't really seen you before but you look quite friendly :)
4. I'm 185cm tall, black hair and heaps of freckles xD
5. male
6. I just came out of a relationship and my crush went into one so yeah, single I suppose
7. 16
8. Australian!
9. 9
10. Probably Hungry Jacks (Australian equivalent of Burger King)

I'll see you there too and thanks!

replies.body:
Thank youh Jess

Favorite day of the week is Wednesday because I don't have to go to school and no one is home so the internet is fire.
Creates interesting snapchats and very friendly everywhere you go.
Worst thing that's happened to me this week: umm, probably when I NEARLY failed 3 of my 5 classes (physics, maths B (hard maths) and business management) all I got was Cs and C-s lol
